translation.en: and Chrystie was a flight attendant.
translation.ja: クリスティーは客室乗務員

translation.en: So between the two of us, we could make ends meet.
translation.ja: ２人でどうにか生計を立てた

translation.en: And then on the weekends, I was competing in track meets all over the world.
translation.ja: そして週末になると世界中の大会に出た

translation.en: At night, I'd dream about the Games, I'd dream about the technique.
translation.ja: 寝ている間も試合の夢ばかり見てた

translation.en: I was obsessed with getting the most out of myself.
translation.ja: 最大限の力を出したかった

translation.en: [commentator] On the left of your screen is Bruce Jenner.
translation.ja: 左はブルース･ジェンナー

translation.en: -This is not a great event for Bruce. -[starting pistol fires]
translation.ja: 不得意な種目です

translation.en: -[commentator] Mirabeau… -[Caitlyn] I'm not a great sprinter,
translation.ja: 短距離は苦手だった

translation.en: so the 100 meters was always a challenge.
translation.ja: 100メートル走は勝てなかった

translation.en: [commentator] …but to keep pushing to get that time.
translation.ja: 追い込みをかけてきます

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I was frustrated
translation.ja: イライラしてた

translation.en: because I needed to get better.
translation.ja: もっと強くなりたくて “ジェンナー ４位”

translation.en: [Chrystie] He was an incredible athlete,
translation.ja: “平凡な成績” 彼はすごい選手だけど 彼はすごい選手だけど

translation.en: but it just seemed like he was always struggling with his form on the hurdles.
translation.ja: ハードル走にはいつも苦戦してるみたいだった

translation.en: Come on, Bruce!
translation.ja: 頑張って

translation.en: Bruce really needed somebody he could train with.
translation.ja: 彼には練習相手が必要だった

translation.en: This is one.
translation.ja: ヴィンス･ストライカー

translation.en: This is a picture taken at City College, and this is Bruce, back…
translation.ja: ヴィンス･ストライカー これは僕とブルースが練習中に撮った写真だ これは僕とブルースが練習中に撮った写真だ

translation.en: This was back in our training days.
translation.ja: これは僕とブルースが練習中に撮った写真だ

translation.en: We were pretty buffed out back then.
translation.ja: ２人ともムキムキだろ

translation.en: Bruce hanging on my arm.
translation.ja: 腕にぶら下がってる

translation.en: I had read an article where Bruce Jenner had just won an all-comers meet,
translation.ja: 競技会の記事でブルースを知った

translation.en: and here's a picture of this great-looking guy running,
translation.ja: ハンサムな彼の写真を見て

translation.en: and I'm thinking, "Yeah, I'm gonna go to San Jose."
translation.ja: “サンノゼに行こう”と　思った

translation.en: I go into the YMCA, and lo and behold, there's Bruce.
translation.ja: ＹＭＣＡに行くと驚いたことに彼がいて

translation.en: He's doing a weight workout.
translation.ja: トレーニングしてた

translation.en: Walks up to me and basically says, "Hey, I wanna train for the decathlon."
translation.ja: “十種競技をやりたい”と　彼が言うから⸺

translation.en: And I went, "Okay. Follow."
translation.ja: 私は“ついて来て”って言った

translation.en: [Stryker] We'd started running together, going to the track together. We started lifting together.
translation.ja: ランニングもダンベルも全部 一緒にやった

translation.en: The hardest part about this is trying to get the weight up on top of you, okay?
translation.ja: 一番キツいのはダンベルを上げる時だ

translation.en: Put 'em on your knees, and then lean back and kick one leg and the other leg, right? Sort of one right behind each other and get it up. Okay. [grunts]
translation.ja: 膝に乗せ 後ろに倒れながら片足ずつ蹴り上げる

translation.en: [Vince] When we trained, he'd talk about Nikolai Avilov.
translation.ja: 彼はアビロフの話をしてた

translation.en: Bruce always said, "This is the guy I'm gonna have to beat to win."
translation.ja: “アビロフに　勝ちたいんだ”と

translation.en: He wanted to break his world record.
translation.ja: つまり世界記録更新だ

translation.en: So we would do clean and jerks.
translation.ja: 重量挙げもしたよ

translation.en: This is not just lifting weights. This is an athletic move.
translation.ja: 体を鍛えるためにね

translation.en: We got that up to over 300 pounds. Even after the weights, we'd go back out and run again.
translation.ja: 136キロまで上げたらトラックに戻って走り込みだ

translation.en: He would talk about running that 1500 meters and running Avilov down at the end.
translation.ja: 最後の1500メートルでアビロフを抜くために

translation.en: Every day, he seemed to get faster, more powerful.
translation.ja: 彼は日に日に実力を上げていった

translation.en: He started to gain his momentum and winning competitions.
translation.ja: 大会での優勝も増えた

translation.en: [commentator] There you see Bruce Jenner, shows tremendous speed. There he goes.
translation.ja: 驚異的なスピードです 見事なジャンプ

translation.en: -And that's a good jump. -[grunts]
translation.ja: 見事なジャンプ

translation.en: [commentator] You can hear the grunt.
translation.ja: すごい声です

translation.en: I always felt mentally weaker than everybody else. That became my greatest asset.
translation.ja: 心が弱いと分かってたことが強みになった

translation.en: I was a lot more dedicated. I was a lot more intense about it.
translation.ja: 誰よりも熱心に誰よりも真剣に取り組んだ

translation.en: I wasn't told to do this. I wasn't brought up to do this.
translation.ja: 誰かに言われたからじゃない

translation.en: It was me. I wanna be better than everybody else,
translation.ja: 強くなろうと自分で決めて

translation.en: I wanna train harder than everybody else,
translation.ja: 人一倍 努力したの

translation.en: because I needed that in my life.
translation.ja: 私に必要なことだったから

translation.en: The year before the Olympics, people started recognizing Bruce.
translation.ja: オリンピックの前年には注目され始めた

translation.en: [commentator] Bruce Jenner of San Jose, California. He's out to better his record at the Summer Olympic Games in Montreal.
translation.ja: 来年のオリンピックで記録更新を目指します

translation.en: They knew that he was a favorite to compete against Avilov.
translation.ja: アビロフに勝てると期待されてたわ

translation.en: The pressure was really on then.
translation.ja: すごい重圧だった

translation.en: Next year is a biggie, right?
translation.ja: 来年は優勝？

translation.en: -Ooh, you can say that again. -Are we gonna get it?
translation.ja: もう１度 金メダル？

translation.en: I feel confident that Freddy and myself are gonna be right in there.
translation.ja: メダルが取れる自信はあるよ

translation.en: I see the top three right now, Fred, myself, and Avilov.
translation.ja: トップ３には入るだろう

translation.en: -[interviewer] Next year for the Olympics? -Well, it's 11 months from right now.
translation.ja: ついに来年だね あと11ヵ月だ

translation.en: The chances… I have just as good a chance as anybody, and probably better than most, to win it.
translation.ja: 誰よりも優勝するチャンスがあると思う

translation.en: Hopefully, we'll be up there. We'll be competitive, I'm sure.
translation.ja: 上位入りを狙うよ

translation.en: The only way I can compete and to win is to put everything into it.
translation.ja: 優勝するには全てをかけて戦うしかない

translation.en: Right now, my attitude is the Olympic Games.
translation.ja: オリンピックに向けて努力は惜しまない

translation.en: I'm gonna sacrifice anything I have to do.
translation.ja: オリンピックに向けて努力は惜しまない オリンピックに向けて努力は惜しまない “ジェンナー　目標は金メダル”

translation.en: [commentator] In the 1500 meters now. Jenner is running for the title.
translation.ja: 優勝を目指して走るジェンナー 優勝を目指して走るジェンナー パンナム杯メキシコシティ パンナム杯メキシコシティ

translation.en: Jenner. All of a sudden, Jenner now gets a challenge.
translation.ja: ジェンナーが今追い抜かれました

translation.en: This will help Jenner
translation.ja: ここからです

translation.en: because it will ensure the fact that that seven seconds is gonna be there.
translation.ja: ラストスパートで一気に追い上げます

translation.en: Jenner now fighting desperately because he doesn't like to lose to anybody,
translation.ja: 勝つために必死で走っています

translation.en: especially Tito from Argentina.
translation.ja: チトを抜けるか？

translation.en: There we go. On past…
translation.ja: さあ ゴールです

translation.en: [stammering] But it's unreal for me to experience this,
translation.ja: 夢のような体験です

translation.en: and so, I-I just couldn't be more happy and more excited.
translation.ja: これ以上幸せなことはないと思います

translation.en: [interviewer] How much does it mean to you for your children to see their dad win a major championship?
translation.ja: メジャーでの優勝をお子さんに見せられましたね

translation.en: [Tiger] It's special just to have them here. Luckily, I was able to win.
translation.ja: ええ　そうですね勝てて幸運でした

translation.en: [interviewer] Thank you for that, and what a great champion.
translation.ja: ありがとうございました

translation.en: Around here, that will never be…
translation.ja: この偉業は決して…

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Good for him.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: You know, watching Tiger win, I mean, I appreciate the work that goes into it.
translation.ja: 彼が優勝できたのは努力の賜物だと思う

translation.en: You know, everybody has to overcome obstacles in life.
translation.ja: 誰もが人生で壁にぶつかるし

translation.en: Everybody's got stuff in their life that they have to deal with.
translation.ja: 対処しなきゃいけない問題を抱えてる

translation.en: And over the last, you know, 11 years, he's been through a lot. Physical, emotional,
translation.ja: 彼は10年ほど 精神的にも肉体的にも苦しんできた

translation.en: scandals, you name it. Embarrassment.
translation.ja: スキャンダルなどもあったしね

translation.en: But he overcame that. I mean, one regret I have,
translation.ja: でも復活した 私が悔やんでるのは

translation.en: that my kids, who are the closest in my life right now, weren't there when I was competing.
translation.ja: 選手だった頃子供がいなかったこと

translation.en: [Gerald Ford] Ladies and gentlemen of the Plattsburgh area,
translation.ja: プラッツバーグの皆さん

translation.en: let me say that
translation.ja: この場にいる機会を得られて⸺

translation.en: it's really a great privilege and a very high honor
translation.ja: この場にいる機会を得られて⸺ジェラルド･Ｒ･フォード大統領

translation.en: to have the opportunity to be here in Plattsburgh.
translation.ja: ジェラルド･Ｒ･フォード大統領 ジェラルド･Ｒ･フォード大統領心から光栄に思います

translation.en: Let me congratulate all of you
translation.ja: どうか祝福させてください

translation.en: for the accomplishment of making the American Olympic team in 1976.
translation.ja: どうか祝福させてください オリンピックのアメリカ代表団が結成されました

translation.en: And on behalf of all Americans, good luck and God bless you.
translation.ja: アメリカ国民を代表し皆さんの健闘を祈ります

translation.en: -Bruce, would you sign this picture? -Sure. Sure.
translation.ja: サインして いいですよ

translation.en: I'll be around for the next few days, so we can get as many as you want.
translation.ja: 数日 滞在するからまたサインしてあげるよ

translation.en: -That one's there right there. All right. -[woman] Thank you!
translation.ja: ここでいい？ ありがとう

translation.en: You're so nice!
translation.ja: 本当に親切ね

translation.en: How's that? There you go. All right? Good enough.
translation.ja: これでいい？　さあどうぞ

translation.en: -[child] One more! -[child 2] Thank you!
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: [man] You're in here, buddy.
translation.ja: 車に乗ってくれ

translation.en: [Caitlyn] They put all of us in vans, and they drove us up to Montreal.
translation.ja: 選手はバンに乗ってモントリオールまで移動した

translation.en: One of my motivating factors was that I was never gonna do this again after the Games.
translation.ja: “大会後は解放される”　という思いが私の支えだった

translation.en: I had to give up too much to be there.
translation.ja: 諦めたものが多すぎた

translation.en: Win, lose, draw.
translation.ja: 勝っても負けても引き分けでも

translation.en: Whatever it is, I'm done.
translation.ja: 私は引退すると決めてた

translation.en: [Chrystie] When I got to Montreal, I was nervous. I was tense.
translation.ja: モントリオールに着いた時は緊張してた

translation.en: There were about 70 of us. My family was there.
translation.ja: 応援団は70人ほどで私の家族もいたわ

translation.en: His parents, of course.
translation.ja: 彼の両親をはじめ⸺

translation.en: Cousins, friends.
translation.ja: 親族や友達も来てた

translation.en: [Vince] The athletes themselves get tickets,
translation.ja: 選手はチケットが手に入る

translation.en: and so, Bruce and Chrystie said, "Do you want a ticket?"
translation.ja: ブルースに来るかと聞かれたんだ

translation.en: Well, heck yeah! I'm going to Montreal.
translation.ja: 当然 応援に行ったさ

translation.en: Autographed pictures of Bruce Jenner, right here!
translation.ja: ブルースのサイン入り写真だ

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Chrystie and I were talking, and we go,
translation.ja: クリスティーと意見が一致した

translation.en: "Bertha should go." You know, she did every workout.
translation.ja: バーサも連れてくべきだって

translation.en: The least she can do is go to the Games.
translation.ja: 毎日 練習してたんだから

translation.en: [Caitlyn] The Olympics are the biggest happening in the world.
translation.ja: オリンピックは世界最大の競技会よ

translation.en: Over 200 countries come together for good,
translation.ja: 200もの国の選手が１カ所に集い⸺

translation.en: highlighting the best of humanity.
translation.ja: 能力の限りを出し尽くす

translation.en: I got to witness how big they are, the pageantry, the history behind the Olympic Games,
translation.ja: スケールの大きさと歴史の深さを体感した

translation.en: the colors, the country.
translation.ja: 各国の特色もね

translation.en: This is bigger than anything you've ever done in your entire life.
translation.ja: 間違いなく人生で最大のイベントだった

translation.en: [commentator] From Montreal, the Games of the 21st Olympiad,
translation.ja: モントリオールから⸺ オリンピックの模様をお届けします

translation.en: an exclusive presentation of ABC Sports.
translation.ja: オリンピックの模様をお届けします

translation.en: Today, it all begins from the great new Olympic Stadium.
translation.ja: 会場はオリンピック･スタジアムです

translation.en: Next week, we'll begin our coverage of the decathlon.
translation.ja: 来週は十種競技ですね

translation.en: The most demanding event in Olympic track-and-field, the decathlon…
translation.ja: 陸上競技での注目は十種競技で…

translation.en: Ten events in just two days, ending with a grueling 1500 meters run.
translation.ja: ２日間で10種目最後は1500メートル走です

translation.en: And the man who wins is generally hailed as the world's greatest athlete.
translation.ja: 勝者はキング･オブ･アスリートです

translation.en: And when it's over, they say, it will be Bruce Jenner of the United States
translation.ja: アメリカ代表のジェンナーか

translation.en: and Nikolai Avilov of the Soviet Union.
translation.ja: ソ連のアビロフでしょう

translation.en: [Caitlyn] The hardest part is the decathlon's always near the end of the Games.
translation.ja: 十種競技は大会の終盤に行われる

translation.en: You go to the big hype, you get there,
translation.ja: 到着したらまずは開会式に参加

translation.en: and then it's almost two weeks after the opening ceremonies,
translation.ja: 到着したらまずは開会式に参加 そのまま２週間 過ごしてやっと競技が始まる

translation.en: you finally get to run the decathlon.
translation.ja: そのまま２週間 過ごしてやっと競技が始まる

translation.en: I didn't wanna speak to anybody.
translation.ja: 話す気分になれず⸺

translation.en: Just leave me alone.
translation.ja: 放っておいてほしかった

translation.en: Bruce Jenner, position three.
translation.ja: ブルースは３番へ

translation.en: Dick Schaap has two athletes from each team with him
translation.ja: アメリカの代表選手４名を⸺

translation.en: in the studios of CFCF in Montreal. Good morning, Dick.
translation.ja: モントリオールのスタジオに迎えました

translation.en: Good morning, Lloyd. I hope it's not quite as early there as it is here.
translation.ja: おはよう　そちらは早朝かな

translation.en: We have four of the American Olympians. Bruce, your competition begins Thursday.
translation.ja: ブルース　木曜から競技が始まるね

translation.en: I have three more days to go before I have to compete.
translation.ja: 始まるまで あと３日ある

translation.en: All the work has been done. Yesterday, I had my last training session.
translation.ja: 昨日 最後の練習をした

translation.en: So now it's just three days of rest. I stay off my legs
translation.ja: あとは体を十分に休めて⸺

translation.en: and get myself mentally prepared, really, for the competition.
translation.ja: 本番に向けて意識を切り替える

translation.en: That's it, gentlemen. Thank you.
translation.ja: お疲れさまでした

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I did not train to be on TV.
translation.ja: テレビ出演は望んでない

translation.en: I didn't train to get paid.
translation.ja: 高額な報酬も

translation.en: I trained my butt off eight hours a day
translation.ja: 毎日 ８時間も練習したのは⸺

translation.en: to stand on the same stage as the guys that had gone before me.
translation.ja: 歴代の選手たちと同じ舞台に立つため

translation.en: I wanted that title of the greatest athlete in the world.
translation.ja: 最高のアスリートになるためだった

translation.en: [announcer] …the athletics competitions of the Games of the 21st Olympiad.
translation.ja: 第21回オリンピック競技大会陸上競技です

translation.en: [Caitlyn] As soon as I get inside the stadium, I look over,
translation.ja: スタジアムに入って周りを見たら⸺

translation.en: and I see Avilov on the other side of the track.
translation.ja: 反対側にアビロフが見えた

translation.en: [commentator] 8,454 points, the world record by Avilov.
translation.ja: 世界記録はアビロフの８４５４点

translation.en: The event starts at ten o'clock in the morning and runs through the day,
translation.ja: 競技は10時から１日中行われます

translation.en: and the first event, the 100-meter dash.
translation.ja: まずは100メートル走です

translation.en: [Caitlyn] It's a scary thing to go through.
translation.ja: 本番は本当に怖い

translation.en: When you have that much time and energy
translation.ja: それまで どんなに時間とエネルギーを⸺

translation.en: and work invested in something like that,
translation.ja: 競技の練習に費やしていても

translation.en: and you get one try.
translation.ja: チャンスは１度

translation.en: Come on!
translation.ja: ブルース！

translation.en: I think he broke 11! I think he broke 11.
translation.ja: 11秒を切ったわ

translation.en: [Caitlyn] As I was slowing down, I kind of had a hard time slowing down.
translation.ja: あの時は減速するのが難しかった

translation.en: Maybe I did okay.
translation.ja: 手応えはあった

translation.en: Finally, when my time was put up on the board, I ran 10.94.
translation.ja: 表示されたタイムを見たら10秒94だった

translation.en: And it was the fastest 100 meters of my life.
translation.ja: 100メートルの自己ベスト

translation.en: And I thought, "Whoa!"
translation.ja: 自分でも驚いた

translation.en: [commentator] 10.94.
translation.ja: 10秒94です

translation.en: 819 points for Jenner. So Jenner is…
translation.ja: ジェンナーが高得点を獲得しました

translation.en: [commentator] The second event in the decathlon, the long jump.
translation.ja: 次の種目は走り幅跳びです

translation.en: Here, I think you can expect Avilov to excel,
translation.ja: ここでの注目はアビロフと

translation.en: as well as Kratschmer, and the standings…
translation.ja: クラツシュマーで…

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Avilov, a very good long jumper,
translation.ja: アビロフの得意な競技だった

translation.en: so I can't lose too much ground to him.
translation.ja: 差をつけられたくない

translation.en: Now we're gonna see Bruce Jenner in the long jump.
translation.ja: 次はブルース･ジェンナーの番です

translation.en: Bruce Jenner, this is not one of his real strong events,
translation.ja: この種目は得意ではありません

translation.en: his personal record twenty-three eight,
translation.ja: 自己ベストは7.25メートル

translation.en: but it's a good leap by Bruce Jenner!
translation.ja: 大きく跳びました！

translation.en: [commentator] Very good leap by Jenner!
translation.ja: 見事なジャンプです

translation.en: That is a good jump, I guess.
translation.ja: いい記録が出そうだ

translation.en: Looks good.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: -7.05! -[William] 7.05! What'd you say he wanted?
translation.ja: ７メートル５センチ 目標は？

translation.en: -7.21, but it-- -He got it!
translation.ja: ７メートル21センチ ７メートル21センチウィリアム＆エスター･ジェンナー ウィリアム＆エスター･ジェンナー

translation.en: No, no. No, no. It's, uh… It's still not as good as he wants.
translation.ja: ウィリアム＆エスター･ジェンナーダメよ ウィリアム＆エスター･ジェンナー ウィリアム＆エスター･ジェンナー目標には届いてない

translation.en: [Caitlyn] That really ticked me off,
translation.ja: かなりイライラした

translation.en: because I knew Avilov's ready to go.
translation.ja: 次がアビロフだったから

translation.en: [commentator] We look now at the defending champion, Nikolai Avilov.
translation.ja: 王者のニコライ･アビロフです

translation.en: Smooth. Confidently.
translation.ja: スムーズな立ち上がりから…

translation.en: On the board! Good. Good reach on the board.
translation.ja: 跳びました 見事な跳躍です

translation.en: He hit it right on the money.
translation.ja: 見事な跳躍です

translation.en: Thrust himself forward to save precious centimeters.
translation.ja: 体を前に突き出して数センチを稼ぎます

translation.en: And he should… Oh, he does have a good one. Twenty-four eight for 925 points.
translation.ja: 記録は７メートル52センチ925点を獲得しました

translation.en: So Avilov should move up off that jump.

translation.en: We broke a big story on the website
translation.ja: 独占スクープです

translation.en: that Bruce Jenner has gone to a Beverly Hills plastic surgeon to ditch his Adam's apple.
translation.ja: ブルース･ジェンナーがのどぼとけを切除しました

translation.en: [man] Hey, Bruce, did you get a surgery? Any comments on that?
translation.ja: 整形手術を受けたんですか？

translation.en: [man 2] Do you want people not to talk about your gender reassignment and tell your daughters to keep it on the down-low?
translation.ja: 性転換の話は娘さんたちにも秘密ですか？

translation.en: [man 3] Kendall, are you upset about your dad's sex change?
translation.ja: お父さんの性転換の感想は？

translation.en: [Caitlyn] My kids are seeing all of this…
translation.ja: 子供には知られたけど

translation.en: and I still hadn't told them what was going on.
translation.ja: 私の口からは言わなかった

translation.en: And that, to me, is the worst part of that time in my life. You know?
translation.ja: あの頃が私の人生で最悪な時期だった 今の私の方が親として まともよ

translation.en: Because I am a better parent than that, you know?
translation.ja: 今の私の方が親として まともよ

translation.en: But I wasn't then.
translation.ja: 当時は違った

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: The goats are comin'.
translation.ja: ヤギもおいで

translation.en: [Burt] I'll never forget when my dad told me she is gonna transition.
translation.ja: 性転換のことを父から聞いた時⸺

translation.en: We went on this walk with the goats
translation.ja: ２人で歩きながら

translation.en: and I said, you know, "Hey, Dad, I've… I've known for decades," you know, and…
translation.ja: ずっと前から気づいてたと父に伝えた

translation.en: But there was something about the honesty and the…
translation.ja: お互いに腹を割って話せたし

translation.en: and the closeness, and the…
translation.ja: 近づいた感じがした

translation.en: My father just putting the guard down,
translation.ja: あんなに心を開いて話す父は⸺

translation.en: which was something I don't see very often.
translation.ja: あんなに心を開いて話す父は⸺ ほとんど見たことがない

translation.en: And it was a conversation that I'll cherish…
translation.ja: ほとんど見たことがない あの時の会話は⸺

translation.en: more than any other conversation I've ever had with my father.
translation.ja: 父との一番の思い出だよ

translation.en: That was a really cool moment in my life.
translation.ja: あれは私の人生でも大切な瞬間だった

translation.en: And so, kind of the last hurdle I had to get over
translation.ja: 乗り越えるべき最後の難関は

translation.en: was, um, uh, my faith in God.
translation.ja: 神に対する私の信仰心だった

translation.en: And so, I invited my pastor over, and I told him my story.
translation.ja: そこで牧師を呼んで自分の話をして

translation.en: And I basically asked him, "In God's eyes, how does he see me? Am I doing the right thing?"
translation.ja: 神の目から見て私は正しいのかと牧師に尋ねた

translation.en: And I could never really get an answer.
translation.ja: 答えは得られなかった

translation.en: But I had spent my entire life up to that point hiding.
translation.ja: でも あの時まで私は真実の姿を隠し

translation.en: Not being able to be myself.
translation.ja: 自分を偽って生きてきた

translation.en: I wanted to just smack everybody right across the face
translation.ja: みんなの顔を殴ってこう言いたかった

translation.en: and say, "Screw all you people. This is me."
translation.ja: “人にどう思われても　これが私よ”

translation.en: "Accept it."
translation.ja: “受け入れて”

translation.en: [Abby Wambach] Ladies and gentlemen, the courageous,
translation.ja: “ケイトリンと呼んで”ご紹介します “ケイトリンと呼んで” 勇気ある女性ケイトリン･ジェンナーです

translation.en: the stunning Caitlyn Jenner.
translation.ja: 勇気ある女性ケイトリン･ジェンナーです

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I remember when I got my driver's license.
translation.ja: 運転免許証の名前も変えた

translation.en: Caitlyn Marie Jenner, gender marker F.
translation.ja: ケイトリン･マリー･ジェンナーよ

translation.en: And the good news.
translation.ja: 嬉しいのは⸺

translation.en: We're right down the middle.
translation.ja: 今ここにいること

translation.en: I thought, "Wait a second. Can I do all the things I used to do?"
translation.ja: 今ここにいること 何もできなくなると思ってた

translation.en: You know? I used to race cars, fly airplanes. Um…
translation.ja: 今までやってたカーレースや飛行機の操縦や

translation.en: You know, play golf and all that. Should I quit all that stuff?
translation.ja: ゴルフをやめることになるかと

translation.en: And after a while, I thought, "That's ridiculous."
translation.ja: でも よく考えたらバカげた話

translation.en: Yeah. So I play golf, and I'm playing better than ever.
translation.ja: だからゴルフも続けてる絶好調よ

translation.en: Turn! Ugh.
translation.ja: 曲がって！

translation.en: Didn't turn.
translation.ja: ダメだった

translation.en: Kind of a bittersweet moment. Very excited, but on the other hand,
translation.ja: 新しい名前を見て嬉しかったけど

translation.en: it was kind of wiping Bruce off the face of the Earth.
translation.ja: ブルースを消した戸惑いもあった

translation.en: Sometimes they go, you know,
translation.ja: 名前はケイトリンになったけど

translation.en: "Oh, Caitlyn won the Games. It was really Caitlyn."
translation.ja: 名前はケイトリンになったけど オリンピックで優勝したのはブルース

translation.en: And I go, "No, no, no, no, no. [laughs] Bruce won the Games."
translation.ja: オリンピックで優勝したのはブルース そう言って何の問題もないわ

translation.en: I have no problem saying that, okay?
translation.ja: そう言って何の問題もないわ

translation.en: I give him credit. He did that.
translation.ja: 彼が勝ったんだから

translation.en: Now, was that all of me and my whole story? Not even close. There's so much more to me than that.
translation.ja: もちろん それが私の人生の全てじゃないけど

translation.en: But I do honor what he was able to do,
translation.ja: ブルースの功績をたたえてオリンピックの話では

translation.en: and I always call it Bruce, uh, 'cause Bruce did do that.
translation.ja: ブルースの功績をたたえてオリンピックの話では ブルースと呼ぶ

translation.en: In hindsight, you know, I… I wonder, um…
translation.ja: もし性の問題がなかったら

translation.en: if my dad wasn't trans, if my dad would have won.
translation.ja: 父は優勝できただろうか？

translation.en: I just wonder how much of that drive came from
translation.ja: 優勝の原動力になったのは強い願いだ

translation.en: wanting that acceptance from a group of men that he never--
translation.ja: 人々に自分を受け入れてほしいって

translation.en: she never felt
translation.ja: 女としてね

translation.en: accepted by completely or never felt truly part of.
translation.ja: ずっと疎外感と共に生きてきたんだ

translation.en: [Caitlyn] You know, I just turned 70.
translation.ja: 私は70歳を迎えた

translation.en: I don't have that many years left.
translation.ja: この先は長くない

translation.en: One thing that I always wondered…
translation.ja: いつも思うことがある

translation.en: That day when you go up to the Pearly Gates,
translation.ja: いつか天国に行ったら

translation.en: and you stand there,
translation.ja: 神に聞きたい

translation.en: you ask God, "Why did you do this?"
translation.ja: “なぜ私を悩ませたの？”

translation.en: "Why this issue is in my head?"
translation.ja: “なぜ私を苦しめたの？”

translation.en: You wonder, "Is there a reason for this?"
translation.ja: “何か理由があったの？”

translation.en: You get up there and say, "Hey, did I do a good job?"
translation.ja: “私は よく頑張った？”

translation.en: Hopefully, he says, "Yes."
translation.ja: “イエス”と言ってほしい

translation.en: "You've raised a wonderful family."
translation.ja: “すばらしい家族を作り”

translation.en: "You've finally lived your life authentically."
translation.ja: “自分に正直に生きた”と

translation.en: It's all I can do and move on.
translation.ja: 人生は前に進むしかない

translation.en: But now it's a new chapter, and let's see what Caitlyn can do.
translation.ja: ケイトリンとしての第２章を楽しむわ

translation.en: End of story.
translation.ja: これが私の物語
